tool_description: This is your digital wallet, you can create, share, update values...
name: Wallet
title: Wallet

api_list.name: Get User Wallets
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wallet37.p.rapidapi.com/wallet/6492f433139a79cae6a3149e"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wallet37.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://wallet37.p.rapidapi.com/wallet/{userid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wallet37.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://wallet37.p.rapidapi.com/user/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wallet37.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
